title: Blueprint, "Apartment House, Rue Heine, Plan du Rez de Chaussee", 1925
signed: Signed bottom right: Dressee par L'Architecte/ Soussigne/ Paris le 4 December 1925/ Hector Guimard
inscribed:
Inscribed top: IMMEUBLE RUE H. HEINE/ REZ DE CHAUSSEE
Inscribed bottom: RUE HENRI HEINE
description: Floor plan for the ground floor of the apartment building on Rue Heine. The top half of the diagram shows that a large portion of this space is dedicated to a garage. Rooms are labelled and scale is noted throughout the design.

tombstone.epitaph:
Blueprint, "Apartment House, Rue Heine, Plan du Rez de Chaussee", 1925.
1925. Blueprint. Gift of Mme. Hector Guimard. 1950-66-34.
